title: Be Positive or Be Quiet | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Be Positive or Be Quiet | Joel Osteen
description:
Too often, we talk ourselves out of the things we’ve believing for. But you can’t speak defeat and expect to see victory. If you want to see God’s promises for your life come to pass, you have to start declaring them.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
